message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1000000. It's a unique opportunity, and I believe it will be very valuable for your business.  Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am looking to keep my investment within $1500000. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $950000.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints.  While $950000 is a good offer, I'm still hoping to get closer to my original asking price.  I'm willing to come down to $975000. This is a significant investment for you, and I believe you'll see a great return on it.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counter with an offer of $960000.
